title: New: Mona Vale – Not Given Up
body:
This debut single from **Mona Vale** aka multi-instrumentalist Jamie Hoddle is pure vibes.

Merging super slick almost Caribou-esque production with Bon Iver inspired vocals, it’s gorgeously ethereal and a truly immersive listen. Check out _Not Given Up_ below.

excerpt.full: This debut single from Mona Vale aka multi-instrumentalist Jamie Hoddle is pure vibes. Merging super slick almost Caribou-esque production with Bon Iver inspired vocals, it’s gorgeously ethereal and a truly immersive listen. Check out Not Given Up below.
